channel.title: Posts on Jim Owens
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jim Owens

item.title: Personal Statement Resources
item.description: To my connections applying to graduate school this cycle, below are some excellent resources and annotated examples to help you prepare a great personal statement! (1) https://lnkd.in/d_RFWbq (2) https://lnkd.in/dawccfn (3) https://lnkd.in/dgUjiUa Note that the annotated statements are all very different, which is a good thing. There is no winning formula and you can write your statements in a way that best suits you and your experiences. These were helpful in informing me of which content to include and how I could most effectively make a case for admission.

item.title: Website is live!
item.description: After several online tutorials, and some on-again, off-again debugging, my personal website is up and running! I will use this site as a longer-standing version of my LinkedIn profile, documenting relevant updates and content as I make my way through graduate school. Thanks for stopping by! Due credit to the talented @colorfullyso for creating my avatar/logo.
